Name: Form
Description: Collect information from your users using validation rules.

SubComponentData.Name: Root
SubComponentData.Description: Contains all the parts of a form.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: onClearServerErrors
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the form is submitted or reset and the server errors need to be cleared.

SubComponentData.Name: Field
SubComponentData.Description: The wrapper for a field. It handles id/name and label accessibility automatically.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the form is submitted or reset and the server errors need to be cleared.

PropData.Name: name
PropData.Description: The name of the field that will be passed down to the control and used to match with validation messages.

PropData.Name: serverInvalid
PropData.Description: Use this prop to mark the field as invalid on the server.

SubComponentData.Name: Label
SubComponentData.Description: A label element which is automatically wired when nested inside a Field part.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: Control
SubComponentData.Description: A control element (by default an input) which is automatically wired when nested inside a Field part.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

SubComponentData.Name: ValidityState
SubComponentData.Description: Use this render-prop component to access a given fieldâ€™s validity state in render (see ValidityState on MDN). A field's validity is available automatically when nested inside a Field part, otherwise you must pass a name prop to associate it.

PropData.Name: children
PropData.Description: A render function that receives the validity state of the field.

PropData.Name: name
PropData.Description: A render function that receives the validity state of the field.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.
